tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE camera_footage (
camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
camera_name VARCHAR(50),
timestamp TIMESTAMP,
footage_url VARCHAR(255),
resolution VARCHAR(20),
duration INT,
incident_flag BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id UUID,
  incident_type TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES camera_footage(camera_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityCamera (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  resolution TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  footage BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE SurveillanceFootage (
  footage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  duration INTERVAL,
  footage BYTEA,
  FOREIGN KEY(camera_id) REFERENCES SecurityCamera(camera_id)
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AlertNotification (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY(log_id) REFERENCES IncidentLog(log_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SecurityCameraFootage (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    footage_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    footage BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevice (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Incident (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveillanceTeam (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    leader_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentResolution (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    resolution_details TEXT
)
